name: HandWashCountDown
0:
”Alexa, open hand wash countdown”
”Alexa, start hand wash countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hand wash countdown
des: Ask Alexa to start Hand Wash Countdown and she will tell you to be sure to be ready with warm water and soap. The countdown then begins for 20 seconds. (CDC recommended amount of time for proper hand cleaning)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
